data.description: Submit test results to the litmus webtool
data.communities: irc.mozilla.org, litmus mailing list, litmus code
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The Test::Litmus module allows writers of automated software tests
    to have their tests submit the results to a given installation of
    litmus, mozilla.org's testcase management tool using litmus's
    backend.cgi and LWP. The Test:: namespace seems to be a likely
    location for this module, as it is used to help authors of automated
    tests.
